languages.text: Grants immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, but reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10 and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.

languages.text: 免疫{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果，但会使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低2点，效果持续至战斗结束。

traits.locale_text: 免疫{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}に対する耐性を付与するが、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が−10、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が−2減少する。

traits.locale_text: 3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎のダメージ{/g}に耐性が付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}10

languages.text: Otorga inmunidad al {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} y a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, pero reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} en −10 y los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} en −2 hasta el final del combate.

traits.locale_text: Otorga inmunidad al {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} e inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Gewährt Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, verringert aber bis zum Ende des Kampfes die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} um −10 und die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} um −2.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt Immunität gegen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und bewirkt einen −10-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g} für 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}

languages.text: Rend invulnérable aux {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} et au {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, mais réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de −10 et les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} de −2 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Ateş hasarı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanamaya{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazandırır ancak {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliğini 10, {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanlarını{/g} 2 azaltır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
